alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 11:16PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WALTHALL AND SOUTHEASTERN PIKE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CST... At 1116 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kokomo to near Tylertown to near Mount Herman. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tylertown, Salem, and Dexter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for southeastern Louisiana...and southern Mississippi.
